text: The two-twenty to Llangrwl has failed to complete her mission. Paled, did Dai. For the two-twenty carried, for him, a cargo more precious than jewels. Though Mofydd. Owen was, as he feared, departed out of his life, he still loved her dearly. Already, even as with trembling fingers he fastened his trouser clips, he was seeing her lying in some dreadful ravine, or beset by robbers, or being whisked off to Emergency Ward 10.
